Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: I think best price quality for high quality coffees. Also home made cakes. You can sit inside and there's a outside terrace as well. My favorite place in west for take away or quick coffee.

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: Only coffee place open on Christmas day in the neighborhood. Seating was plenty and comfy, atmosphere relaxed and the croissant  fresh. Coffee was slightly burnt by the (too hot) milk. House blend (dark roast) isn't very interesting. Could improve if they offer two different roasts and make sure the barista doesn't overheat the milk.

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: looked a bit touristy which made me sussed, but as recommended, truly good coffee here, folks. an enormous place with indoors and outdoors seating.

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: For years this has been a lovely spot for a cup of coffee or a little bite. The new interior looks really nice as well!

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: We came on a Sunday afternoon and pretty much all tables were dirty. Some of them had food and plates from previous customers. …

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text:
Real Italians making superb strong coffee.
Has working spots, wifi and electricity!
Thanks!

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: My colleagues like this place for coffee in the mornings, even though it's a longer walk from work. But having tried the coffee, I like it too! …

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: Love the coffee, love the relaxed quiet vibe, decor and comfortable seating. I Recommend a quick pop in for a coffee

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: Great coffee shop that sells coffees, fresh juices and cakes. There is a lot of space inside so it's perfect for chatting or doing some work. The fresh orange juice was very nice and reasonably priced

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: Very good for coffee and wonderfull carrotcake

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: Too expensive coffe and sweet which don’t taste that good((

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: So happy BuonGiorno came to this spot a few years ago now. They serve constant top quality coffee and cakes. The place is big, open and spacious. Calm atmosphere. It would have been nice if the garden in the back was accesible, it looks …

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: New staff every time I go there. If you go in the afternoon (around 2 pm) and you wanna order a sandwich, they’re too lazy to make it. They talk bad about you in Italian (thinking that you don’t understand it😂). …

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text:
Great coffee nice space!

Edit: No more chips paired with the ham and cheese sandwich. That extra crunch …

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: I used to come here multiple times a week with my dog for coffee. Perhaps due to personnel changes i was informed not to be welcome with my dog. I discovered some other great places in the neighborhood where dogs are welcome, like Local Heros.

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: The con was really that I found it too pricey for the food, paid almost 12 EUR for a lunch. Otherwise, nice environment and pretty good sound isolation so I can imagine it is convenient for professionals that need to get some work done. Possibility to sit outside for good weather and inside for bad weather is also a pro.

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: They revamped the store you can now get a small breakfast, burgers, churros and sweets to go along with your beverages...

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: Nice place! Good ☕ and pleasant staff. For only 5 euro you can grab a nice breakfast with a coffee of your choice, croissant, boiled egg and small orange juice.

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: Excellent place with conformable sitting area. You can also find a small children's area with books and toys. Either you come for a coffee break of have some work done, it is a great place. In the summer the offer nice outside sitting

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: Nice coffee, nice cookies :)

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: For 5 euros you can get a very nice breakfast if you're early: croissant, coffee, orange juice and boiled egg. Superb staff that will help you with a smile!

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: staff very polite and nice

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: It's a place with a nice atmosphere, to relax or to work... tasty smoothies and cakes... Good service.. In special, Karina who is always with a smile :)

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: This cafe is a good option to take an excelent coffe with chill music and calm ambient. there is a large room inside. Starbuck style. Take away is posible. Fast service

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: Good food quality comparing to the prices

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: Great location, very nice people, nice casual feeling

Review Text:

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: Friendly staff and decent cappuccinoes for when you're on the go.

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
Review Text: The place is larger than it looks from the outside.  There is plenty of sitting in the back.  Nice place to relax and have a coffee or snack.  Free WiFi.

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar

Review Text: Very bitter coffee taste. Its good if you like very strong espresso taste.

Name: Buongiorno Espressobar
